channel.title: -Help-
channel.description:
READ BEFORE VOTING!!
Hello everyone, im not here for programing help really but i would like to keep this topic alive i have read the rules and understand them to the point of this thread is not breaking rules. Its the help section and i need help with several things.
[b]Suggestions[/b] I need suggestions for my server, no im not a professional programmer. But i would like to see what you guys are into here at moparscape as in playing runescape private server wise.
In your suggestions you can either PM me via forums, or actually post here on this thread. Your suggestions need to be in depth and detailed as much as possible so i can understand what you are actually wanting and the point of the suggestion.
Now for the poll up top. Please vote which licnesed forum you would rather use. Vbulletin or Invision Power Board, if you vote other please specify which you would like to see.
IF i do need programing help i will post it below here.
-Ronald0-
Note: NO FLAMING or SPAMMING, if done so will be reported. If a moderator needs to speak to me about this thread please PM me.
Thanks.
